title: All In
description: You're my exception.You were my anomaly.Until you broke me like a promise and shattered me with your lies.I told you I’ve destroyed everything that's ever been mine.You hurt me.I know.I should have told you the truth.I should have walked away.Tell me how to fix this.You can't. Broken things never work as good as they used to, remember?Wanna bet?You're not funny, Holden.I'm not joking, Bishop.I'm raising the stakes this round.This time...I'm going all in.You already lost me.I’ll win you back.Because it’s me and you, angry girl.Until the end.
author: Ashley Jade
